description: The name of a resource and whether it is namespaced.

categories.description: A list of the grouped resources this resource belongs to

group.description: The preferred group of the resource. Empty implies the group of the containing resource list. For subresources, this may have a different value.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

name.description: The plural name of the resource.

namespaced.description: This indicates if the resource is namespaced or not.

shortNames.description: A list of suggested short names of the resource.

singularName.description: The singular name of the resource. This allows clients to handle plural and singular opaquely. The singularName is more correct for reporting status on a single item.

storageVersionHash.description: The hash value of the storage version, the version this resource is converted to when written to the data store. Value must be treated as opaque by clients. Only equality comparison on the value is valid. This is an alpha feature and may change or be removed in the future. The field is populated by the apiserver only if the `StorageVersionHash` feature gate is enabled. This field will remain optional even if it graduates.

verbs.description: A list of supported kube verbs

version.description: The preferred version of the resource. Empty implies the version of the containing resource list. For subresources, this may have a different value.
